disketaa_directional_shadow.name: Directional shadow
disketaa_directional_shadow.description: Project a directional shadow with adjustable angle, scale, and offset to simulate realistic lighting from any direction.

sharpness.name: Sharpness
sharpness.desc: Controls the hardness of the shadow.

angle.name: Angle
angle.desc: Rotation angle of the shadow in degrees.

horizontal_center.name: Horizontal Center
horizontal_center.desc: Horizontal pivot point for the scaling.

vertical_center.name: Vertical Center
vertical_center.desc: Vertical pivot point for the scaling.

horizontal_offset.name: Horizontal Offset
horizontal_offset.desc: Horizontal offset of the shadow relative to the original image.

vertical_offset.name: Vertical Offset
vertical_offset.desc: Vertical offset of the shadow relative to the original image.
